verses.verse: Do we begin again to be endorsing ourselves? Or do we, not as some, need letters of endorsing statements to you or letters of endorsing statements from among you?
You are our letter that has been written in our hearts, known and read by all people,

as you are shown that you are a letter of the Anointed King, served by us, having been written not with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God, not in stone slabs, but in physical slabs of a heart.
We have this type of confidence through the Anointed King toward God
(not that we are adequate out from ourselves to consider anything, as if it were from ourselves, but our adequacy is from God),
who also made us adequate to be servants of a new treaty, not of a document, but of a spirit. You see, the document kills, but the Spirit gives life.

If the serving of the death (that has been imprinted in alphabetic characters in stones) happened in magnificence in such a way for the sons of Israel to not be able to stare into the face of Moses because of the magnificence of his face (the magnificence that is rendered useless),
how will the serving of the Spirit not be more in magnificence?
You see, if the serving of the guilty sentence is magnificence, much more the serving of the right way overflows in magnificence;
for even the thing that has been made magnificent has not even been made magnificent in this part, on account of the superior magnificence.
You see, if the thing that is rendered useless is through magnificence, much more the thing that remains is in magnificence.
So having this type of anticipation, we use it with much openness
and not anything like Moses. He was putting a veil on his own face with the intent for the sons of Israel not to stare at the conclusion of the thing that is rendered useless.

But their thought processes became hard as stone. You see, till the day today the same veil stays on the reading of the former treaty, it not being unveiled that something is rendered useless in the Anointed King.
But until today, whenever Moses is read, a veil lies on their hearts.
Whenever it returns back toward the Master, the veil is taken away all around.
The Master is the Spirit. Where the Spirit of the Master is, freedom is there.

We all who see the reflection of the magnificence of the Master in a face that has been unveiled are transformed into the same image out of magnificence for magnificence, exactly as it is out of the Spirit of the Master.
